name: SEV (Herweins)
description:
A really short 2D platformer where you're connected to a platform.
Made in a week for the Lost Relic Games-GAME JAM.

Can be played with WASD/ARROW KEYS and the SPACEBAR.

Tools Used: Construct2, Chiptone, Beatle Map

(I find myself having a glitch where the game music doesn't start when I play the game if it doesn't, please restart until you can hear the music. Sorry for the inconvenience.)
